review: I live over 6 hours from Minute Maid Park. Yet according to MLB, I'm still one mile inside the blackout area for Houston Astros broadcasts. I was led to believe that this stick would alleviate that problem, or at least give me the Root Sports Network to watch the games. Alas, it does neither. It really only gives me a handful of channels and networks over my satellite package. Lucky for you the information for the product was able to disguise all of that so that I'd blow my money!
author: Ben Wyles

review: After I finally got this hooked up right I love it.
author: Kindle Customer

review: It was pretty easy to install and set up.Fairly easy to use.  Works fine.
